long_description: Make the 3-season Marmot Starlight 1P Tent your solo backcountry shelter and enjoy its light weight, minimal bulk, excellent ventilation and durable weather protection. Partial fly features taped seams; remove it from the no-see-um mesh canopy for stargazing and enhanced ventilation. Waterproof, seam-taped floor features a catenary cut that creates straight, taut edges along the tent's perimeter to maximize usable floor space. Wide door allows easy entry; single vestibule creates space to keep your boots out of the rain. Color-coded clips and DAC Featherlite NSL poles help ensure a quick and easy pitch. Interior pockets organize small gear. The Marmot Starlight 1P Tent features reflective accents and jingle-free nylon zipper pulls.
short_description: Make the 3-season Marmot Starlight 1P Tent your solo backcountry shelter and enjoy its light weight, minimal bulk, excellent ventilation and durable weather protection.
